HEADER_TEXT: The easiest way to use and share basic maps for outdoor activities
LAST_MAP_RELOADED: The last used map has been reloaded
MAP_LOADED_TEXT: Press the location button when you want to start geolocation.
UNABLE TO EXTRACT QR GEOMAP: Not a valid QRgeomap map file
QR_SOURCE_LINK: Source link for the QR code
QR_SOURCE_LINK_NOTE: NOTE: If you enter a link for the QR other than 'https://www.qrgeomap.com' the map cannot be hosted (published) here.
DOWNLOAD_NOTE: NOTE: If you are going to publish the map, keep in mind that when you press the 'Publish Map' button the map will be redrawn (to include in the QR code the link where the map is hosted). In that case, publish the map first and then if you want you can also download it (the QR will already include the link).
PUBLISH_MAP_TITLE: Do you want to post this map and get a direct link to use it?
PUBLISH_MAP_SUBTITLE: Please note that this map will be completely public.
PUBLISHED_MAP_URL_TEXT: The public link for this map is:
PUBLISHED_MAP_PRIVATE_KEY_TEXT: The code shown below is the private key (unique identifier) of the map you just published. Write it down in case you ever want to request something about this map (for example, delete it)
LEGAL_ALL: Legal Notice, Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
